name: gl2ps
description:
GL2PS is a C library providing high quality vector output for any OpenGL
application.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: freeglut
dependencies.description:
FreeGLUT is a free-software/open-source alternative to the OpenGL
Utility Toolkit (GLUT) library

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependencies.name: libice
dependencies.description: libICE - Inter-Client Exchange Library.

dependencies.name: libsm
dependencies.description: libSM - X Session Management Library.

dependencies.name: libxau
dependencies.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.

dependencies.name: libxdamage
dependencies.description: This package contains the library for the X Damage extension.

dependencies.name: libxdmcp
dependencies.description: libXdmcp - X Display Manager Control Protocol library.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxfixes
dependencies.description:
This package contains header files and documentation for the XFIXES
extension. Library and server implementations are separate.

dependencies.name: libxi
dependencies.description: libXi - library for the X Input Extension.

dependencies.name: libxmu
dependencies.description:
This library contains miscellaneous utilities and is not part of the
Xlib standard. It contains routines which only use public interfaces so
that it may be layered on top of any proprietary implementation of Xlib
or Xt.

dependencies.name: libxt
dependencies.description: libXt - X Toolkit Intrinsics library.

dependencies.name: libxxf86vm
dependencies.description: libXxf86vm - Extension library for the XFree86-VidMode X extension.

dependencies.name: libxcb
dependencies.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.

dependencies.name: libdrm
dependencies.description:
A userspace library for accessing the DRM, direct rendering manager, on
Linux, BSD and other systems supporting the ioctl interface.

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: texlive
dependencies.description:
TeX Live is an easy (we hope) way to get up and running with the TeX
document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with
binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also
Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages,
and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages
around the world.

dependent_to.name: sumo
dependent_to.description:
Eclipse SUMO is an open source, highly portable, microscopic and
continuous road traffic simulation package designed to handle large road
networks. It allows for intermodal simulation including pedestrians and
comes with a large set of tools for scenario creation.

dependent_to.name: vtk
dependent_to.description:
The Visualization Toolkit (VTK) is an open-source, freely available
software system for 3D computer graphics, image processing and
visualization.

dependent_to.name: root
dependent_to.description: ROOT is a data analysis framework.

dependent_to.name: octave
dependent_to.description:
GNU Octave is a high-level language, primarily intended for numerical
computations. It provides a convenient command line interface for
solving linear and nonlinear problems numerically, and for performing
other numerical experiments using a language that is mostly compatible
with Matlab. It may also be used as a batch-oriented language.
